name: Dungeon Run (CassetteCow)
description:
Use your sword to fight your way through an action packed dungeon in this short but challenging game.

Press F to play in full-screen - best played this way

The aim of the game is to fight your way through the dungeon, fighting ghosts and trolls along the way. Your only weapon is a sword that follows the direction of your mouse. Use platforming skills to progress through the levels and try to get a new high-score in each run!

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move your character

Press W or up arrow to jump

Press R to reset level or esc to quit the game

Hold Left-Click to attack enemies

Use the mouse pointer to direct the sword

The heart counter measures your lives left. Once it reaches zero, you re-spawn at the start of each level

The score is determined based off the number of enemies killed and the time you complete the levels. An overall score is given at the end of the game. Try to beat your high-score!

You must kill all enemies in a stage to progress.

The timer shows how long you have been on the level. Try to complete levels quicker to get a higher score.

The level checkpoints teleport you to the next level by stepping on them. They only appear once all enemies have been killed.

Note: this game was made as a student project.

Credits:

Game design and programming - Liam Simmons

Music - Nihilore

Art - Anokolisa, rvros
